text: The 2011 Rossendale Borough Council election was held on 5 May 2010 to elect members of Rossendale Borough Council in Lancashire, England. One third of the councilwas up for election and the Conservative party were in overall control of the council at the time of the election. The composition of the council was: * Conservative 19 * Labour 13 * Liberal Democrat 3 * Community First Party 1 ==Ward results== ==References== 2011 Category:2011 English local elections Category:2010s in Lancashire
title: 2011 Rossendale Borough Council election
